QuestData.Title: Scouting the Sinkholes
QuestData.Description: Can you feel the tremors in the earth?$B$BThe Scourge's nerubians are on the move deep beneath the ground. They've emerged to the southwest in the Geyser Fields, and are harassing the patrols Chieftain Wintergale sent out.$B$B<The taunka elder offers you a worn map.>$B$BPerhaps a single person can succeed where the patrols have failed. Take this with you to the Geyser Fields and map out the locations of the Nerubian sinkholes.
QuestData.LogDescription: Greatfather Mahan at Taunka'le Village wants you to use the Map of the Geyser Fields to mark the locations of the South Sinkhole, the Northwest Sinkhole, and the Northeast Sinkhole.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you marked the locations of the sinkholes?
QuestData.RewardText: <Greatfather Mahan accepts the map, but makes no move to examine it..>$B$BWe'll be able to use your information later, once we're prepared to carry out the plan.
